tweet: For a man obsessed with the stock market, Trump's latest threat to close the border shows a remarkable level of ignorance.  Closing the border to our third largest trading partner will only further damage his faltering economy and exacerbate the humanitarian crisis he has created

This devastating loss of life was undoubtedly preventable had the child been given the necessary medical attention she so desperately needed. We will not allow this to happen again. (3/3)

In response to this tragedy, today my staff met with Border Patrol & toured various Border Patrol Stations in my district to discuss the protocols in place for medical services for migrants in their custody. (2/3)

It is unacceptable & most of all, unforgivable that a child has lost her life while in U.S. Border Patrol custody. For months, my calls for an investigation into the living conditions & treatment of migrants, especially children, have gone unanswered by the Administration. (1/3)
